fields.headline: Events: Hitchcon '09, London
fields.bodyText: If you see large groups of middle-aged men carrying towels in the vicinity of London's Southbank this weekend then you may be well advised to follow them. They have not have discovered a new local swimming pool, but will instead be heading for this celebration of the 30th anniversary of the publication of Douglas Adams's legendary tome The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy. The event features appearances by Arthur Dent actor Simon Jones and Mark Wing-Davey, better known as Zaphod Beeblebrox, who will join Andrew Sachs and The Simpsons' Harry Shearer on stage. Eoin Colfer is on hand to debut his follow-up And Another Thing and there is a discussion on Adams and his work. Southbank Centre, SE1, Sun, visit southbankcentre.co.uk
